response.original_title: 12 Digit Masterstroke: The Untold Story of Aadhaar
response.overview: An unlikely team of public & private sector professionals spearheaded by tech wizard Nandan Nilekani came together to create one of the world's largest social identity program. They defied all odds & crafted a unique identity for 1.4 billion Indians. Narrated by Ankur Warikoo, the story captures the journey of Aadhaar Card from inception, to its implementation across different governments.
response.title: 12 Digit Masterstroke: The Untold Story of Aadhaar
